Joe Lieberman came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press. "Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible." ESPN.com's Matt Mosley

"He thought it was very constructive. that they agreed on cutting spending and reducing our deficit," Robert Gibbs said, that we should have a broad discussion about, with the American people, the size and the scope of the problem that we face getting our fiscal house in order. No agreements were reached, though, and neither side offered specific examples following the meeting on where common ground can be found on spending cuts. Robert Gibbs cautioned that Wednesday's meeting wasn't a negotiation session
